name: Veteran
aura: Increases Ally SPD in Dungeons by 15.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Disarm
skills.books:

Level 5: Damage +15%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 3 turns if the target is killed. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Head Hunter
skills.books:

Level 4: Damage +5%

Level 6: Damage +15%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 1 turn. Damage increases according to this Champion's MAX HP.
skills.name: Massacre
